sentences.en: ‘Is she serious?’ ‘I wonder.’
sentences.cn: “她是认真的吗？”“我怀疑。”

sentences.en: "That's right!" Bobby exclaimed in wonder. "How did you remember that?"
sentences.cn: “对呀！”博比惊奇地叫道。“你是怎么想起那件事的？”

sentences.en: &B{it is little wonder that} the fax machine is so popular.
sentences.cn: 传真机如此受欢迎并不奇怪。

sentences.en: a good night's sleep can work wonders for mind and body.
sentences.cn: 一夜好眠对身心都能产生奇妙的作用。

sentences.en: Dr Williams describes it as a potential wonder drug.
sentences.cn: 威廉斯医生称其可能会成为特效药。

sentences.en: Harry dismissed his old friend's speech as "a nine-day wonder"
sentences.cn: 哈里对老朋友的讲话不屑一顾，称之“火不了多久”。

sentences.en: He’s been leaving work early a lot – it makes you wonder , doesn’t it?
sentences.cn: 他最近经常提早下班——让人觉得奇怪，是不是？

sentences.en: I just wonder what you make of all that.
sentences.cn: 我只是纳闷儿你是怎么看待这一切的。

sentences.en: I was expressing some amazement and wonder at her good fortune.
sentences.cn: 我对她的好运既惊奇又感叹。

sentences.en: I was wondering if I could borrow your car?
sentences.cn: 请问我能否借一下你的汽车？

sentences.en: I wonder if I might have a word with Mr Abbot?
sentences.cn: 请问我能否和阿博特先生说几句话？

sentences.en: I wonder if Tom ever had his teeth fixed anywhere else.
sentences.cn: 我在想汤姆是不是在别的地方整过牙。

sentences.en: I wonder if you could find me a deck of cards?
sentences.cn: 不知您能否为我找一副纸牌？

sentences.en: I wonder if you'd be kind enough to call him.
sentences.cn: 请你给他打个电话好吗？

sentences.en: I wonder now if that drink had been drugged.
sentences.cn: 我现在想那饮料是否被人动过手脚。

sentences.en: It makes you wonder about the effect on men's behaviour.
sentences.cn: 这让人怀疑其对男性行为的影响。

sentences.en: It’s a wonder no one got hurt.
sentences.cn: 竟然没有人受伤，真是奇迹。

sentences.en: Mickelson was hailed as the wonder boy of American golf.
sentences.cn: 米克尔森被称颂为美国高尔夫球界的神奇男孩。

sentences.en: No wonder you’ve got a headache, the amount you drank last night.
sentences.cn: 怪不得你头痛，你昨晚喝太多了。

sentences.en: She began to wonder what he was playing at.
sentences.cn: 她开始纳闷他在搞什么鬼.

sentences.en: Small wonder that he decided to take no part in the debate.
sentences.cn: 难怪他决定不参加辩论呢。

sentences.en: Sometimes I wonder about his behaviour.
sentences.cn: 有时我对他的行为感到惊讶。

sentences.en: The East Window is a wonder of medieval glazing.
sentences.cn: 东窗是中世纪玻璃安装工艺的奇迹。

sentences.en: Under such circumstances, it is little wonder that they experience difficulties.
sentences.cn: 在这种情形下，他们遇到困难就不足为怪了。

sentences.en: What are they going to do now, I wonder ?
sentences.cn: 我想知道，他们现在打算怎么办呢？

words.tran_cn: 奇妙的；令人惊奇的；非常的
奇境，仙境；非常奇妙的地方

phrases.tran_cn: 作为惊奇的原因；惊奇地
轰动一时的东西（但很快就会被忘记）
并不奇怪；不足为奇；十分正常
[古语] …得令人惊叹，…得叫人惊异
对…感到奇怪；对…感到疑惑
神奇女侠；神力女超人；神奇女郎（电视剧）
［用于看到令人高兴的东西时发出的感叹］永远都有奇迹
创奇迹；产生奇妙的作用
创造奇迹；产生奇妙作用

trans.tran_en: If you refer, for example, to a young man as a wonder boy, or to a new product as a wonder drug, you mean that they are believed by many people to be very good or very effective

trans.tran_cn: 惊叹，惊奇，奇迹，奇事，奇才
trans.tran_en: used to say that something is very surprising
to think about something that you are not sure about and try to guess what is true, what will happen etc

trans.tran_cn: 想知道，感到疑惑，感到诧异
trans.tran_en: to think about something that you are not sure about and try to guess what is true, what will happen etc
